title: Siranush Sharoyan
subtitle: Growth Director @ Heatbit
paragraphs: I am a strategic growth and marketing leader with extensive experience in the fintech, and entertainment industries, proficient in both B2B and B2C markets.

Currently, I hold the position of Growth Director at two startups, Intently (Y Combinator W23 batch) and Heatbit. My responsibilities encompass establishing the growth teams, formulating go-to-market strategies, setting up experimentation processes, and devising communication plans for product launches and customer engagement.

Previously, I was part of Sensorium, where my role was pivotal in developing a communication and brand strategy for the world's first high-end metaverse. I successfully facilitated Sensorium's industry recognition and media presence in top-tier publications such as Forbes, Bloomberg, VentureBeat, and a dozen more. Additionally, I negotiated strategic partnerships, including an agreement with Epic Games and collaborations with artists like David Guetta, Jean-Michel Jarre, and Steve Aoki.

Prior to Sensorium, I led growth initiatives at Crypterium, a UK-based fintech startup. My key contributions included assembling a marketing team and supporting the launch of two key products: a mobile application (0 to 1M+ downloads and a prepaid card. I was also leading brand marketing, user acquisition strategies, and  establishing product-led growth mechanics.

My consulting experience includes projects for renowned global brands such as Adidas and Durex. Before embarking on my marketing career, I spent five years in business media, with my work published in The Wall Street Journal and Forbes.
My educational background includes a Ph.D. from Lomonosov Moscow State University.

- establishing growth teams; - designing go-to-market strategies; - setting up marketing experimentation processes (user acquisition, retention, lifecycle comms, etc.); - content-marketing strategies;- working with media

title: Kamenskaya Marina
subtitle: CMO  @ BIN√îME
paragraphs: A self-starter and a problem solver who loves working in an inspirational, challenging and growth-oriented environment, thinking strategically, and getting hands dirty. Have both economic and business education, 23 years of professional background in marketing and sales.

A key part of my experience is to lead the key strategic initiatives and execute the portfolio of complex global marketing projects, strategic partnerships programs and integrated communications worldwide scale campaigns to ignite growth in business, to maximize customer value and brand performance at European markets. I have managed the multicultural cross ‚Äì functional teams across Europe and the USA.

I am enthusiastic and passionate about designing all aspects of marketing mix and commercial excellence with a particular focus on increasing global brand values, generating high quality leads, identifying sales market opportunities, creating executable market and customer engagement strategy to extent the market share across geography.

Currently, as the Interim Marketing and Global Market Access Director , I am responsible for building companies' global leadership positions in the markets worldwide and achieving a significant contribution towards global sales.

- Entering new market- Developing new product / brand- Pricing strategy - Growth strategy - Starting new business- Responding to a competitor‚Äôs actions - Increasing sales - Reducing costs- Increasing profits - Estimating market size
